artist: Artist: R. Crumb , et al.; Printer: Barefoot Press, Raleigh, N.C.; Publisher: Everett Rand , Durham, N.C.; Publisher: Gioia Palmieri , Durham, N.C.

description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical image of two cubist figures with text printed in magenta and black-and-white offset lithography on pink wove paper covers; 28 pp.
medium: Magenta and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Mineshaft, no. 33
